response.original_title: Spike & Mike's Sickest of the Sick Festival of Animation
response.overview: A joyous collection of shorts from Spike and Mike's Sick and Twisted Animation. See such gems as a special Olympics game, an alternative to toilet paper, and several shorts involving a rather dimwitted and homely guy named Lloyd who seems to take pleasure in mutilating himself.
response.title: Spike & Mike's Sickest of the Sick Festival of Animation
